ruang_1b.name: Ruang 1B
ruang_1b.description_en: Located in front of the 1st floor stairs.

ruang_administrasi.name: Ruang Administrasi
ruang_administrasi.description: Terletak di sisi kanan ujung koridor, setelah melewati ruang 1B.
ruang_administrasi.description_en: Located at the right end of the corridor, past Room 1B.

ruang_rapat_1.name: Ruang Rapat 1
ruang_rapat_1.description: Terletak di sisi kiri setelah tangga lantai 1 dan berada di depan ruang 1B.
ruang_rapat_1.description_en: Located on the left side after the 1st floor stairs, in front of Room 1B.

ruang_humas.name: Ruang Humas
ruang_humas.description: Terletak di sisi kiri ujung koridor dan depan ruang administrasi.
ruang_humas.description_en: Located at the left end of the corridor, in front of the administration room.

toilet_wanita.name: Toilet Wanita Lantai 1
toilet_wanita.description: Terletak di belakang gedung, setelah ruang administrasi.
toilet_wanita.description_en: Located at the back of the building, past the administration room.

toilet_pria.name: Toilet Pria Lantai 1
toilet_pria.description: Terletak di belakang gedung, setelah ruang administrasi.
toilet_pria.description_en: Located at the back of the building, past the administration room.

lift_1.name: Lift Lantai 1
lift_1.description: Terletak di depan pintu masuk gedung.
lift_1.description_en: Located in front of the building entrance.

tangga_1.name: Tangga Lantai 1
tangga_1.description: Terletak di sebelah kiri pintu masuk gedung.
tangga_1.description_en: Located to the left of the building entrance.
